metadata.title: CVE-2024-12379 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A denial of service vulnerability in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsfrom 14.1 prior to 17.6.5, 17.7 prior to 17.7.4, and 17.8 prior to 17.8.2allows an attacker to impact the availability of GitLab via unboundedsymbol creation via the scopes parameter in a Personal Access Token.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
